RefParameter.Name: SynchroSrc
RefParameter.Description: Synchronization signals (HSYNC and VSYNC) sources. Note: This parameter can be a value.

RefParameter.Name: TearingEffectActivation
RefParameter.Description: Tearing effect . Activate it to specify the configuration details

RefParameter.Name: TearingEffectSrc
RefParameter.Description: Tearing effect source. Note: This parameter can be a value.

RefParameter.Name: TearingEffectPolarity
RefParameter.Description: Tearing effect polarity. Note: This parameter can be a value.

RefParameter.Name: TearingEffectInterrupt
RefParameter.Description: Tearing effect interrupt. Note: Useful only when Tearing effect interrupt parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineClockCounter
RefParameter.Description: Clock Generator Activation. Activate it to specify the configuration details

RefParameter.Name: LCCHwReloadSrc
RefParameter.Description: Line Clock Counter hardware reload source. Note: Useful only when Line Clock Counter hardware reload source parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LCCReloadValue
RefParameter.Description: Line Clock Counter reload value (22 bits). This parameter must be a number between Min_Data = 1 and Max_Data = 4194303.

RefParameter.Name: LCCClockSrc
RefParameter.Description: Line Clock Counter Clock Source. Note: Useful only when Line Clock Counter Clock Source parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: FrameClockCounter
RefParameter.Description: Clock Generator Activation. Activate it to specify the configuration details

RefParameter.Name: FCCHwReloadSrc
RefParameter.Description: Frame Clock Counter hardware reload source. Note: Useful only when Frame Clock Counter hardware reload source parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: FCCReloadValue
RefParameter.Description: Frame Clock Counter reload value (12 bits). This parameter must be a number between Min_Data = 1 and Max_Data = 4095.

RefParameter.Name: FCCClockSrc
RefParameter.Description: Frame Clock Counter Clock Source. Note: Useful only when Frame Clock Counter Clock Source parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineClockSrc
RefParameter.Description: Line Clock Source. Note: Useful only when Line Clock Source parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineClockCalib
RefParameter.Description: Debug purpose. Note: Useful only when Line Clock Calib parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineClockCalib
RefParameter.Description: Debug purpose. Note: Useful only when Line Clock Calib parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: FrameClockSrc
RefParameter.Description: Frame Clock Source. Note: Useful only when Frame Clock Source parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: FrameClockCalib
RefParameter.Description: Debug purpose. Note: Useful only when Frame Clock Calib parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: FrameClockCalib
RefParameter.Description: Debug purpose. Note: Useful only when Frame Clock Calib parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: EventGenerator1
RefParameter.Description: Event Generator 1. Note: Useful only when Event Generator 1 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: EventInterrupt1
RefParameter.Description: Event Interrupt 1. Note: Useful only when Event Interrupt 1 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: FrameEvent1
RefParameter.Description: Event Frame 1. Note: Useful only when Event Frame 1 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineEvent1
RefParameter.Description: Event Line 1. Note: Useful only when Event Line 1 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: EventGenerator2
RefParameter.Description: Event generator 2. Note: Useful only when Event Generator 2 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: EventInterrupt2
RefParameter.Description: Event Interrupt 2. Note: Useful only when Event Interrupt 2 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: FrameEvent2
RefParameter.Description: Event Frame 2. Note: Useful only when Event Frame 2 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineEvent2
RefParameter.Description: Event Line 2. Note: Useful only when Event Line 2 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: EventGenerator3
RefParameter.Description: Event Generator 3. Note: Useful only when Event Generator 3 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: EventInterrupt3
RefParameter.Description: Event Interrupt 3. Note: Useful only when Event Interrupt 3 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: FrameEvent3
RefParameter.Description: Event Frame 3. Note: Useful only when Event Frame 3 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineEvent3
RefParameter.Description: Event Line 3. Note: Useful only when Event Line 3 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: EventGenerator4
RefParameter.Description: Event Generator 4. Note: Useful only when Event Generator 4 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: EventInterrupt4
RefParameter.Description: Event Interrupt 4. Note: Useful only when Event Interrupt 4 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: FrameEvent4
RefParameter.Description: Event Frame 4. Note: Useful only when Event Frame 4 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineEvent4
RefParameter.Description: Event Line 4. Note: Useful only when Event Line 4 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: AbsoluteTimerActivation
RefParameter.Description: Absolute Timer Activation. Activate it to specify the configuration details

RefParameter.Name: FrameCompare1Value
RefParameter.Description: Absolute Frame Compare 1 value (20 bits). This parameter must be a number between 1 and 1048575.

RefParameter.Name: FrameCounterValue
RefParameter.Description: Absolute Frame Counter initial value (20 bits). This parameter must be a number between 1 and 1048575.

RefParameter.Name: FrameOverflowInterrupt
RefParameter.Description: Overflow Interrupt. Note: Useful only when Overflow Interrupt parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: FrameCompare1Interrupt
RefParameter.Description: Frame Compare 1 Interrupt. Note: Useful only when Frame Compare 1 Interrupt parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineCompare1Value
RefParameter.Description: Absolute Line Compare 1. Note: Useful only when Absolute Line Compare 1 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineCompare2Value
RefParameter.Description: Absolute Line Compare 2 value (12 bits). This parameter must be a number between 0 and 4095.

RefParameter.Name: LineCounterValue
RefParameter.Description: Absolute Line Counter value (12 bits). This parameter must be a number between 0 and 4095.

RefParameter.Name: LineOverflowInterrupt
RefParameter.Description: Line Overflow Interrupt. Note: Useful only when Line Overflow Interrupt parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineCompare1Interrupt
RefParameter.Description: Line Compare 1 Interrupt. Note: Useful only when Line Compare 1 Interrupt parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: LineCompare2Interrupt
RefParameter.Description: Line Compare 2 Interrupt. Note: Useful only when Line Compare 2 Interrupt parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: WatchdogTimer
RefParameter.Description: Watchdog Activation. Activate it to specify the configuration details

RefParameter.Name: ClockSrc
RefParameter.Description: Clock Source. Note: Useful only when Clock Source parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: AutoReloadValue
RefParameter.Description: Auto Reload value (16 bits). This parameter must be a number between 0 and 65535.

RefParameter.Name: HwReloadConfig
RefParameter.Description: Reload Configuration. Note: Useful only when Reload Configuration parameter is enabled. The two values wrld rising edge and wrld falling edge not available on Viper64K-H7R.

RefParameter.Name: PreAlarmValue
RefParameter.Description: Pre-alarm value (16 bits). This parameter must be a number between 0 and 65535.

RefParameter.Name: AlarmInterrupt
RefParameter.Description: Interrupt Alarm. Note: Useful only when Interrupt Alarm parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: PreAlarmInterrupt
RefParameter.Description: Interrupt Pre-alarm. Note: Useful only when Interrupt Pre-Alarm parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: RelativeTimer1
RefParameter.Description: Relative Timer 1 Note: Useful only when Relative Timer 1 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: AutoReloadValue1
RefParameter.Description: Auto reload value 1 (12 bits). This parameter must be a number between 0 and 4095.

RefParameter.Name: CounterMode1
RefParameter.Description: Counter Mode 1. Note: Useful only when Counter Mode 1 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: ReloadInterrupt1
RefParameter.Description: Reload Interrupt 1. Note: Useful only when Reload Interrupt 1 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: RelativeTimer2
RefParameter.Description: Relative Timer 2 Note: Useful only when Relative Timer 2 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: AutoReloadValue2
RefParameter.Description: Auto reload value 2 (12 bits). This parameter must be a number between 0 and 4095.

RefParameter.Name: CounterMode2
RefParameter.Description: Counter Mode 2. Note: Useful only when Counter Mode 2 parameter is enabled.

RefParameter.Name: ReloadInterrupt2
RefParameter.Description: Reload Interrupt 2. Note: Useful only when Reload Interrupt 2 parameter is enabled.
